title: Recipes.com Analysis
description: Developed a recipe recommendation model based on cook time, achieving 72.5% accuracy. Conducted hyperparameter tuning, improving accuracy by 6.5%.

title: FortuNBA Projections
description: Built an NBA player statistics prediction tool using K-Nearest-Neighbors, achieving a prediction accuracy of 65% within +/- 7.5% of actual stats.

title: AI-Powered City Construction Review
description: Developed AI-generated checklists to streamline city construction plan-checking by 50%. Built front-end and back-end solutions for AI-powered review.

title: Emergency AI Health Monitoring System
description: Developed an AI-powered health monitoring system with 99.2% accuracy for emergency detection in assisted living, improving response times by 94%.

title: Geo-Spatial Data Analysis for Business Expansion
description: Analyzed geospatial data to optimize business expansion strategies. Used probabilistic modeling to identify high-potential locations for new stores.

title: Cryptocurrency Market Analysis Dashboard
description: Developed a dashboard for cryptocurrency market analysis using PowerBI and Python. Provided insights on price trends, volatility, and market shifts.

title: Real-Time Stock Price Prediction
description: Built a machine learning model using LSTMs to predict stock prices based on historical market data. Achieved 82% prediction accuracy.

title: AI-Powered Resume Parser
description: Developed an AI-based resume parser using NLP techniques to extract skills, experience, and qualifications for automated HR screening.

title: Automated Flight Data Analysis
description: Designed a database schema and analysis pipeline for flight data, improving query efficiency for airlines by 35%.

title: AI Chatbot for Customer Support
description: Created a chatbot using LangChain and ChatGPT APIs for automated customer support, reducing manual support workload by 60%.

title: Personal Finance AI Assistant
description: Built an AI assistant that analyzes user spending patterns and suggests optimized budgets using probabilistic modeling.

title: Interactive Data Visualization Dashboard
description: Developed a dashboard using Tableau and PowerBI to visualize business analytics and detect trends in real-time data.
